title: How useful is the advice from “How to Win Friends and Influence People”? - Quora
tags: How to Win Friends and Influence People (1936 book)

response.answer_text: If you only read one book, make this the one. Until you learn the skills of making friends and influencing people you will not be able to sell. And everything in business and life is about selling. You are selling products, services, jokes, books, tooth brushing to your kids. Judy Helm Wright--Author/PetParent/IntuitiveWiseWoman

Myself, while I may not have taken full advantage of my readings of his book 📓, I do practice a couple of rules for sure: “Never tell another person that he or she is wrong!” (If my beliefs strongly justify it I will tell them that I disagree with them instead. )If you ARE wrong admit it (without any regrets/without shame or humiliation, etc..Anything else you can search for Dale Carnegie's “Little Golden Book 📓” on the Web. It will contain all of the concluding statements from each chapter of Mr. Carnegie's books 📓.
